name: CS-GO Abbreviations
description: Description of various abbreviations and chat meanings for Counter-Strike: Global Offensive

In-game.val: Saving round- players buy nothing to save money to the next round (you can buy small pistols like P250 or some nades It depends how much money do you have)
If you know enemy team is going eco, so you buy weapons with high kill revard (MAC-10, PP-Bizon, Nova).
Damaged
Low hp(I use it under ~30hp)
Strategy
Defuseing the bomb and relase to make the sound of the defuse
Original gangster
Player has a second account with a lower rank to play with
When the team decide to hide and keep the weapons for the next round because is for example 5 vs 2
If you dont heve any money to buy Kevlar Gun, and Nades, just Kevlar (and Nades) you can ask your team mates to drop you a gun
Defuse in smoke while the enemy team is alive
The replay file of a match (Top menu Watch -> My Matches)
When a player notify his teammates of an enemy position
Jumping on a teammates head to get to places what you cant reach on your own
Player with the highest/lowest amount of kills
Stand on each others head and defend an area
When players throw a sequence of grenades in a particular direction(Like mirage A smokes 1.stairs 2.jungle 3.ct)
When more players than usual defend or rush a bomb site
When the Terrorists rush a bombsite with just glocks in a line AND DONT STOP
Team Kill (When you hit or kill your team mate)
Friendly Fire
Forfiet
Nice try
Shut the fu*k up
Pick Up Game
Your kills deaths and assists on te scorboard (like 10-2-2) 10-kill 2-assist 2-death
To buy as many things as possible because it's the last round of the half or game
Get a kill
First important kill of the round
A player leave 'A' to go 'B' because of the enemy
Shooting where you expect someone to be before actually seeing them sometimes through the wall
If you kill or hit an enemy through the wall
Of course
Lose rank
Gain rank
Away from keyboard (not playing right now)
Your player got killd and you kill his killer
Mate
5 kill
4 kill
Good half

Roles / Posts.val: In-game leader (If he low on kills dont blame him his focus is on the strategy)
Who trie to pick the first enemy to gain advantage (If he died in the first 20 sec dont blame him, this post requires Balls Of Steel)
Who use the sniper rifle to get picks
The sneaky guy usually try to sneak behind the enemy alone
Trying to help to defend a site or cut a rush, retake a site and Using nates watch our back or trade the kill

Cheats / VAC.val: Cheats helps to hit the target
Auto shoot when the crosshair is on the enemy
You can see the enemy always on your radar
Playr watching the ground then BOOM headshoot
